message: Hello Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $145. What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $135 for the product. This brings us closer to my budget while still respecting the value of the item.
